channel.title: Excellent video about the plight of Gingers
channel.description:
This video has me so fucking pissed off!!!! How much longer are Gingers going to be able to stand for their status as an oppressed underclass? Are they not human beings just like people with normal hair? If you cut them, do they not bleed? It's time for a ginger R[evol]ution up in this bitch!!!!!!!
[url]https://vimeo.com/11219730[/url]

item.title: Excellent video about the plight of Gingers
item.dc:creator: hercule_poirots_nuts
item.description:
M.I.A is a (sexy) Tamil and this kind of thing has gone on for years against her people and continues to this day. maybe you can empathise a lil better when its faces you are used to attached to the corpses. similar shit goes on all over the place. its def heavy handed but if it helps spread a little empathy then it’s a good thing i reckon/kill whitey
